title: Stylish Lines
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Lines sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/Ife92ChYkR0


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS 


Texture Resolutions:


● Shape Line 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Shape Line 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Shape Line 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Shape Line 04_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Shape Line 05_#[512,288].png 3584x2304

● Shape Line 06_#[512,288].png 3072x2016

● Shape Line 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Shape Line 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Shape Line 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Shape Line 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Shape Line 11_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Shape Line 12_#[512,288].png 2048x1440


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
